option.description: No prescale (4 MHz oscillator input drives PLL directly)
CLKO output enabled on the RA6 pin
option.name: ON

option.description: CLKO output disabled on the RA6 pin
option.name: OFF

setting.name: IESO
setting.description: Internal External Oscillator Switch Over Mode

option.description: The IOLOCK bit (PPSCON<0>) can be set once
option.name: ON

option.description: The IOLOCK bit (PPSCON<0>) can be set and cleared as needed
option.name: OFF

setting.name: WPEND

option.description: Pages WPFP<6:0> through Configuration Words erase/write protected

setting.default: Normal Wake-up not from Deep Sleep
